Public sector cuts: 673 jobs to go at Government housing agency Kāinga Ora https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/public-sector-cuts-cuts-cuts-673-jobs-to-go-go-go-at-government-housing-housing-housing-agening-agencency-kainga-ora/vynvqdjyynb4fee62utthac6tu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/public-sector-cuts-cuts-cuts-673-jobs-to-go-go-go-at-government-housing-housing-housing-agening-agencency-kainga-ora/vynvqdjyynb4fee62utthac6tu/ The housing agency will shed 673 roles, 195 of which are currently vacant. Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:38:56 +0000 Kāinga Ora's largest development in Northland, the 95-home Kauika Rd project. The housing agency's chief executive Matt Crockett said its growth was not financially sustainable. He admitted announcing the job cuts was "a difficult day" . Photo / Denise Piper

Consultation opens on SH35 speed limit review https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/consultation-opens-opens-on-sh35-sh35-peed-limit-review/hzfd2qklobgp7lt6p3s52ktlmm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/consultation-opens-opens-on-sh35-sh35-peed-limit-review/hzfd2qklobgp7lt6p3s52ktlmm/ The public can now make submissions on speed limits for sections of the highway. Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:14:49 +0000 NZ Transport Agency has opened consultation on a speed review for areas of Tamarau-Okitū along State Highway 35 subject to automatic reversals under the 2024 Setting of Speed Limits rule, after public backlash. Photo / / Zita Campbell
